snippet.title: Yet Another Killing Game | ANOTHER TRAILER
snippet.description:
Watch the second official trailer of Yet Another Killing Game, a mystery-thriller adventure game releasing on itch.io and Steam in January 2025! The demo version is available to play now!
*Video footage recorded from a demo build, and may not reflect the full version.

PLAY THE DEMO and WISHLIST on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3217970/Yet_Another_Killing_Game/

PLAY THE DEMO on itch.io:
https://junkakeru.itch.io/yet-another-killing-game

For more info on YAKG:
https://linktr.ee/yakg

You wake up in a house, alone with two beautiful girls... But no one is allowed to leave until one of you DIES.

Why is this happening? What is the purpose of this “killing game”? But most importantly...WHO SHOULD DIE?!

"Yet Another Killing Game" is a mystery-thriller adventure game inspired by other popular story-rich games where you investigate scenes, talk with characters, and make choices that can lead to someone's death. Fans of Danganronpa, Zero Escape, and Ace Attorney will definitely enjoy what YAKG has to offer!

#indie #visualnovel #anime #gaming #danganronpa #aceattorney #zeroescape #indiegame
